flawed_nl_solution:
Thomas made 14 + 7 = <<14+7=12>>12 colored pencil and blending marker drawings.
Thomas made 25 total drawings - 12 colored pencil and blending marker drawings = <<25-12=13>>13 charcoal drawings.
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
